name: Try Something New
description:
In Try Something New, you arrive in Berlin from the US shortly after passage between East and West Berlin has been permitted - the Fall of the Berlin Wall - to sell wares to each side that they would not have had from behind the Iron Curtain. Capitalism is winning the war, and hopefully it'll line your pockets as well.

Awful Winter Jams 2018 Page

v1.2 Update

- Title screen now shows version number.
- Cursor character changes when end of line is reached. It was previously hidden in this case.
- Entered buy/sell values are now saved from day to day.
- Save files from before this version are not compatible.

v1.1 Update

- Fixed bug where spawning 0 customers would crash the game.
- Added Escape Guards for all screens. Y/N prompt appears to confirm quit.
